title: Cafe Gratitude - Hollywood
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican
description: A trendy, raw-food focused, abundance concept restaurant that's part of the Cafe Gratitude restaurants from San Francisco. This one is situated just a walk north of Larchmont Village. Offers both cooked as well as raw cuisine. Extensive smoothies and juices menu, raw desserts. Vegan except for bee products.
